original_title: About Him and Her - The Inarticulate Speech of the Heart
overview: Crossed phone lines lead to a life-changing all-night conversation between a young man and woman, who eventually meet in a hotel room but never physically see each other.* The two lead actors in this film have never met or seen one another nor do they know one another's names even though they worked together on set everyday. They will meet for the first time at the world premiere.
title: About Him and Her - The Inarticulate Speech of the Heart
